a.class: relative flex w-80 flex-col rounded-xl bg-[#F0F0F0] bg-clip-border text-gray-700 shadow-md

div.class: relative mx-4 -mt-6 h-40 overflow-hidden rounded-xl bg-[#9238FF] bg-clip-border text-white shadow-lg shadow-[#9238FF] bg-gradient-to-r from-[#9238FF] to-[#462399]

h5.class: mb-2 block font-sans text-xl font-semibold leading-snug tracking-normal text-[#9238FF] antialiased

p.class: block font-sans text-base font-light leading-relaxed text-inherit antialiased

div.p: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc felis ligula.

button.class: select-none rounded-lg bg-[#9238FF] py-3 px-6 text-center align-middle font-sans text-xs font-bold uppercase text-white shadow-md shadow-[#9238FF]/20 transition-all hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-[#9238FF]/40 focus:opacity-[0.85] focus:shadow-none active:opacity-[0.85] active:shadow-none disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 disabled:shadow-none
